site.hero-message: <title>Trading Journal</title> the complete app for <traders>Traders</traders> and <investors>Investors</investors>
site.hero-description: Keep track of your trades, analyze your performance and improve your results
site.custom-dashboards-description: Create custom dashboards with the metrics that matter to you
site.responsive-design-description: Access your data from any device, anywhere. Mobile, tablet and desktop.
site.chart-performance-description: Analyze your performance with detailed charts and metrics
site.any-market-description: Multiple markets and any currency, we have you covered.
site.pricing-description: Get access to all features and unlimited trades for a low monthly fee or even for free.

charts.title: Charts & Graphs
charts.description: Analyze your performance with detailed charts and metrics connected to your trades charts.

portfolio.title: Portfolio Management
portfolio.description: Create multiple portfolios and manage your trades in one place for any market or currency.

ai.title: AI-Powered insights
ai.description: Get insights and suggestions to improve your trading performance based on your previous trades.

free.title: Free
free.description: Our free plan includes basic features and is perfect for a beginner.
free.trades: As many Trades as you want

essential.title: Essential
essential.description: You are ready to take your trading to the next level.
essential.trades: As many Trades as you want

premium.title: Premium
premium.description: You are a professional trader and need the best tools to help you succeed.

newsletter.title: Subscribe to our <newsletter>Newsletter</newsletter>
newsletter.description: Receba as últimas notícias e atualizações sobre a nossa plataforma.
newsletter.success: Thanks for subscribing to our newsletter

unsubscribe.title: We are sorry to see you are going

auth.signin-description: Enter your email and password below or sign in with your Gmail account
auth.signup-description: Enter your email and password below or sign up with your Gmail account
auth.terms-privacy: By clicking continue, you agree to our <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.
auth.verify-email-description: We have sent an email with a verification code to your email address. Please check your inbox and enter the received code below.
auth.forgot-password-description: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
auth.invalid-token: The token provided is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one to reset your password clicking on the link below.
